text: Rock Mafia are an American record production/songwriting team including Tim James, Antonina Armato, and Paul Palmer who writes songs from pop music/dance music/rock music artists, who are credited for contributing to some of the most successful pop artists since the early 2000s. Rock Mafia's sound is a distinctive blend of dance, pop, and rock. Category:American record producers Category:American songwriters Category:Musical groups established in the 2000s Category:2000s American music groups Category:2000s establishments in the United States
title: Rock Mafia
